imdb.title: Shounen Hollywood
imdb.plot: Five boys band together to form the next generation of Shonen Hollywood, a legendary idol group from their childhoods.

episodes.title: Here We Are, Hollywood
episodes.plot: Kakeru is working to become an idol. One day, the president of his agency has a big announcement, but first his idol group must practice the world's most embarrassing self-introductions! Will the big news be worth the humiliation?

episodes.title: When a Lie Shines
episodes.plot: The boys of SHONEN HOLLYWOOD work hard to clean up HOLLYWOOD TOKYO. Kakeru takes his "part-time job" seriously, but feels like he is following the wrong path. The president tries to give him a push, but is it in the right direction?
